name: Under The Weather (MuchosWaffles)
description:
Made for the "Rain Jam"  :D 

I might upload a webgl build if it actually starts working... : /

(Also note that the game doesn't really end.)

Description:

  • You build umbrellas for frogs based on their designs,

Controls (listed in game):

  • WASD/ARROWS to move
  • E to toggle crafting menu
  • Hold SPACE to collect plant materials
  • Crafting
    • Click material you want to use first
    • Then click the boxes you would like to fill with that color
      •  (stripes, spots, solid color, pole)
    • Once  the umbrella is complete, stand next to the frog and click the umbrella
  • ESC to pause (with the option to review controls)
